writer.name: 阿尔·克拉蒂纳 Al Kratina

director.name: 阿尔·克拉蒂纳 Al Kratina

introduction: Alex, Vampire Slayer is the world's sole defender against vampires, werewolves, and other forces of darkness. Unfortunately for Alex, none of these things actually exist. Nevertheless, he's got a job to do, and there's no way he's going to let reason, logic, or sanity get in his way.Festival awards: - Winner: Fantasia Festival: Best Quebec DIY Short Film - Winner: Buenos Aires Rojo Sangre: Audience Award for Best Film - Winner: Spasm Festival: Grand Jury Prize - Winner: Spasm Festival: Audience Award for Best Film - Winner: Quintus Montreal Italian Film Festival: Best Short Comedy - Winner: Bearded Child Festival: Best Narrative Film
